mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_nickname AS nickname, u.user_photo AS photoUrl, cp.cm_id AS lastReadMessageId FROM CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp JOIN USER u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id JOIN GROUP_CHAT_ROOM g ON g.gcr_id = cp.gcr_id WHERE cp.gcr_id = #{gcrId} ORDER BY (u.user_id = g.user_id) DESC, u.user_nickname ASC
